arguments.title: Herb-Crusted Carrot & Parsnip Puree with Mango Chutney
arguments.description: Savor the mellow sweetness of root vegetables paired expertly with the tropical tang of mango in this elegant dish. A creamy blend of herb-infused carrot and parsnip puree is complemented by a vibrant mango chutney, providing a delightful symphony of flavors that promise to tantalize your palate.
recipe: Peel and roughly chop the carrots and parsnips, then boil in salted water until tender.

While the vegetables are boiling, peel and dice the mango, and place it in a saucepan with white wine vinegar, sugar, chopped red chili, and a pinch of salt. Cook on low heat until reduced to a chutney consistency.
Drain the boiled carrots and parsnips and return them to the pot. Add butter, fresh thyme, rosemary, and heavy cream. Mash until smooth and season with salt and pepper.
Heat olive oil in a small skillet over medium heat. Finely chop the garlic and saut√© until fragrant, then stir into the carrot and parsnip puree.
Serve the herb-crusted carrot and parsnip puree warm, topped with a spoonful of the tangy mango chutney.
